shield Your Privacy Matters

Privacy Policy

Last updated: December 11, 2025

At Job Club, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your data when you use our services.

dataset

What Data We Collect

Personal Information

  • check_circle Full name
  • check_circle Email address
  • check_circle Academic information (major, expected graduation year)
  • check_circle Professional links (LinkedIn, GitHub, personal website, Calendly)
  • check_circle Career goals and aspirations

Usage Information

  • check_circle Browser type and version
  • check_circle Device information
  • check_circle Pages visited and time spent on our site
  • check_circle Interaction with site features
storage

How We Store Your Data

We use industry-standard security measures to protect your information across multiple platforms:

folder_special Customer Relationship Management (CRM)

Your contact information and interaction history are securely stored in our CRM system with encrypted databases and regular backups.

article Sanity Content Management

Profile information, career goals, and user-generated content are stored in Sanity.io with role-based access controls and secure API endpoints.

description Form Submissions

Data submitted through forms is transmitted via HTTPS encryption and stored securely in our database with restricted access.

security All data storage complies with industry best practices and relevant data protection regulations.

analytics

Analytics Tools We Use

We use the following analytics tools to improve our services and understand how users interact with our platform:

  • bar_chart
    Google Analytics: Tracks page views, user behavior, and site performance to help us improve user experience.
  • speed
    Performance Monitoring: Monitors site speed and technical performance to ensure optimal functionality.
  • touch_app
    User Interaction Tracking: Analyzes how users navigate and interact with site features to enhance usability.

info These tools collect anonymized data and do not personally identify individual users unless you are logged in to our services.

cookie

Cookie Usage

We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our site. Here's what you need to know:

Essential Cookies

Required for the website to function properly, including authentication and security features.

Analytics Cookies

Help us understand how visitors use our site so we can improve functionality and content.

Preference Cookies

Remember your settings and preferences for a better personalized experience.

settings You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect site functionality.

delete_forever

Request Data Deletion

You have the right to request deletion of your personal data at any time. Here's how:

How to Request Deletion

  1. 1 Send an email to privacy@jobclub.njit.edu with the subject line "Data Deletion Request"
  2. 2 Include your full name and the email address associated with your account
  3. 3 We will verify your identity and process your request within 30 days
  4. 4 You will receive a confirmation email once your data has been deleted

info Please note that some data may be retained for legal or operational purposes as required by law.

Questions About Your Privacy?

If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please don't hesitate to contact us.

email Contact Privacy Team
